00022 #region Usings
00023 using System;
00024 using System.Threading;
00025 using Utilities.Events;
00026 using Utilities.Events.EventArgs;
00027 #endregion
00028 
00029 namespace Utilities.MultiThreading
00030 {
00036     public abstract class Worker<ResultType,InputParams>
00037     {
00038         #region Constructor
00039 
00044         protected Worker(InputParams Params)
00045         {
00046             try
00047             {
00048                 this.Params = Params;
00049                 this.WorkerThread = new Thread(DoWork);
00050                 this.WorkerThread.IsBackground = true;
00051             }
00052             catch { throw; }
00053         }
00054 
00055         #endregion
00056 
00057         #region Protected Abstract Functions
00058 
00064         protected abstract ResultType Work(InputParams Params);
00065 
00066         #endregion
00067 
00068         #region Protected Functions
00069 
00074         protected void Sleep(int TimeInMs)
00075         {
00076             try
00077             {
00078                 Thread.Sleep(TimeInMs);
00079             }
00080             catch (Exception e)
00081             {
00082                 OnErrorEventArgs Error = new OnErrorEventArgs();
00083                 Error.Content = e;
00084                 EventHelper.Raise<OnErrorEventArgs>(Exception, this, Error);
00085                 throw;
00086             }
00087         }
00088 
00089         #endregion
00090 
00091         #region Public Functions
00092 
00096         public void Start()
00097         {
00098             try
00099             {
00100                 Stopping = false;
00101                 if (this.WorkerThread == null)
00102                 {
00103                     this.WorkerThread = new Thread(DoWork);
00104                     this.WorkerThread.IsBackground = true;
00105                 }
00106                 this.WorkerThread.Start();
00107             }
00108             catch (Exception e)
00109             {
00110                 OnErrorEventArgs Error = new OnErrorEventArgs();
00111                 Error.Content = e;
00112                 EventHelper.Raise<OnErrorEventArgs>(Exception, this, Error);
00113                 throw;
00114             }
00115         }
00116 
00120         public void Stop()
00121         {
00122             try
00123             {
00124                 Stopping = true;
00125                 if (WorkerThread != null && WorkerThread.IsAlive)
00126                 {
00127                     this.WorkerThread.Join();
00128                     this.WorkerThread = null;
00129                 }
00130                 OnEndEventArgs EndEvents = new OnEndEventArgs();
00131                 EndEvents.Content = Result;
00132                 EventHelper.Raise<OnEndEventArgs>(Finished, this, EndEvents);
00133             }
00134             catch (Exception e)
00135             {
00136                 OnErrorEventArgs Error = new OnErrorEventArgs();
00137                 Error.Content = e;
00138                 EventHelper.Raise<OnErrorEventArgs>(Exception, this, Error);
00139                 throw;
00140             }
00141         }
00142 
00143         #endregion
00144 
00145         #region Private Functions
00146 
00152         private void DoWork()
00153         {
00154             try
00155             {
00156                 EventHelper.Raise<OnStartEventArgs>(Started, this, new OnStartEventArgs());
00157 
00158                 Result = Work(this.Params);
00159 
00160                 OnEndEventArgs EndEvents = new OnEndEventArgs();
00161                 EndEvents.Content = Result;
00162                 EventHelper.Raise<OnEndEventArgs>(Finished, this, EndEvents);
00163             }
00164             catch (Exception e)
00165             {
00166                 OnErrorEventArgs Error = new OnErrorEventArgs();
00167                 Error.Content = e;
00168                 EventHelper.Raise<OnErrorEventArgs>(Exception, this, Error);
00169                 throw;
00170             }
00171         }
00172 
00173         #endregion
00174 
00175         #region Events
00176 
00180         public EventHandler<OnEndEventArgs> Finished { get; set; }
00181 
00185         public EventHandler<OnStartEventArgs> Started { get; set; }
00186 
00190         public EventHandler<ChangedEventArgs> Updated { get; set; }
00191 
00195         public EventHandler<OnErrorEventArgs> Exception { get; set; }
00196 
00197         #endregion
00198 
00199         #region Properties
00200 
00204         public bool Stopped 
00205         { 
00206             get 
00207             { 
00208                 if (WorkerThread != null && WorkerThread.IsAlive)
00209                     return false;
00210                 return true; 
00211             }
00212         }
00213 
00217         protected ResultType Result { get; set; }
00218 
00222         private InputParams Params = default(InputParams);
00223 
00227         private Thread WorkerThread=null;
00228 
00232         protected volatile bool Stopping = false;
00233 
00234         #endregion
00235     }
00236 }
